events.name: Specialist Diploma in Advanced Composite - Course Preview
events.description:
Course Synopsis
The Specialist Diploma in Advanced Composites (SDAC) aims to prepare participants with relevant skills and knowledge to support the growing needs of the composite in various industries such as aerospace, biomedical or additive manufacturing (AM) industry. This programme will provide a platform for participants to develop technical expertise in development, manufacture, testing and repair of advanced composite materials.
Upon completion of both certificates, participants will acquire competency and gain hands-on experience in the design, manufacture, non-destructive testing, failure  analysis and repair and maintenance of advanced composite materials in various applications.
Target Audience


Working adults who wish to upgrade their skills and knowledge to support the growing needs of the composite or AM industry.


Individuals who are keen to embark on a career in composite or AM-related industries.


To understand more about the course, please register for course preview at the following weblink:
https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=0LCI9vB5pECGRDX83unQ85cvVtaAlmVCoKm5J-BU0C1UMEc2WFBSWVdFNk05NzRVTzdYOVlHR0hXTi4u

events.name: Wine, Cheese, TYPESCRIPT!
events.description:
We are a group of enthusiastic developers who specialise in Javascript and Node.js, and are passionate about new web and mobile technologies.

Following our first successful meetup, we've decided to hold this monthly :) join us for a fun night of networking and discussion about Typescript.

About Typescript
With the emergence of TypeScript, the development of object-oriented platforms in JavaScript has become significantly simpler for those who are used to classic object-oriented programming languages, such as C++, Java, PHP and C#.
For those who are currently using TypeScript, this meetup would be a great opportunity to learn the best practices and common obstacles that current developers are facing. For those who have never used TypeScript, this meetup would be a great opportunity for you to learn the ins and outs of using it in production.

More about Typescript: http://www.typescriptlang.org/


Topic:
TypeScript and Redux with React Native


Agenda
7.00-7.30pm: Networking, Meet and Greet
7.30-8.00pm: Sharing by Speakers (Lightning Talks)
8.00-8.30pm: Q&A and Sharing from the Floor
8.30-9pm: Networking, Wine and Cheese

Who Should Attend?
- Anyone interested in TypeScript
- Anyone moving from JavaScript to TypeScript
- People using Typescript in their work currently

Our Speakers:
1. Omer Iqbal, Senior Software Engineer at SEA (formerly Garena). Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/muhammad-omer-iqbal-6438a046/

2. 2nd Speaker (Open to public - let us know if you wish to share and be part of the lightning round.)
events.location: Glints Office, 71 Ayer Rajah Crescent #05-01, Singapore S139951
